data.comment: Today's referee, Adam Ladeback, has blown to start the match.
Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
In the minute 3, Orebro to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Kristopher Da Graca is on a sub for Mattias Bjarsmyr for Goteborg.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Behrn Arena.
In Orebro Goteborg drive forward through Alhassan Yusuf. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Adam Ladeback awards Orebro a goal kick.
Goteborg's Alexander Farnerud is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Adam Ladeback signals a Goteborg throw-in in Orebro's half.
Throw-in for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
Free kick for Orebro in the half of Goteborg.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
In the minute 17, Goteborg's Alexander Farnerud is whistled for offside at Behrn Arena.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goteborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Orebro to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
Jake Larsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orebro.
In the minute 25, Orebro have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
In the minute 26, Goteborg drive forward but Alexander Farnerud is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, In Orebro Orebro attack through Nahir Besara. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Behrn Arena.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Orebro.
In the minute 31, Orebro are pushing forward but David Seger's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Orebro are coming forward and David Seger gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, Goteborg have a goal kick.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
In the minute 34, August Erlingmark's header is off-target for Goteborg.
Adam Ladeback awards Orebro a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Goteborg in Orebro.
In the minute 36, Goteborg pushes forward through Tobias Sana, whose finish on goal is saved.
Adam Ladeback signals a Goteborg throw-in in Orebro's half.
Goteborg's Alexander Farnerud gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Orebro.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Goteborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Behrn Arena.
The second half has started at Behrn Arena.
The home team replace Johan Martensson with Dennis Collander.
In the minute 46, Goteborg make their second substitution with Christian Kouakou replacing Alexander Farnerud.
Goteborg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Goteborg.
In the minute 50, Orebro push forward at Behrn Arena and David Seger gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Goteborg defence.
Throw-in for Orebro in the half of Goteborg.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 52, Alhassan Yusuf (Goteborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
In the minute 55, August Erlingmark (Goteborg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Goal! Orebro take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Agon Mehmeti.
In the minute 58, Great play from Jake Larsson to set up the goal.
Orebro's Nahir Besara gets in a shot on goal at Behrn Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 62, Axel Kjall (Orebro) is making a second substitution, with Martin Broberg replacing Agon Mehmeti.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 64, Nahir Besara for Orebro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orebro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Jake Larsson (Orebro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Jake Larsson of Orebro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 68, Goteborg drives forward and Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Important block from the Orebro defence as Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr fires in a strike for Goteborg.
In the minute 71, Fabio de Sousa Silva is replacing Andreas Skovgaard for the home team.
The away team replace Sargon Abraham with Hosam Aiesh.
In Orebro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Emil Holm is on a sub for Alexander Jallow for Goteborg.
In the minute 73, Orebro make their fourth substitution with Kevin Wright replacing Benjamin Hjertstrand.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Goteborg close to the penalty box.
Adam Ladeback awards Orebro a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Orebro.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Jake Larsson is booked for the home team.
Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Goteborg's Alhassan Yusuf gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orebro defender.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 80, Goteborg's Alhassan Yusuf misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Orebro at Behrn Arena.
Adam Ladeback signals a Goteborg throw-in in Orebro's half.
In the minute 81, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Emil Holm of Goteborg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
In the minute 82, Poya Asbaghi is making the team's fifth substitution at Behrn Arena with Adil Titi replacing Victor Wernersson.
An attacking Goteborg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Tobias Sana makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
In the minute 85, Orebro to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Free kick Orebro.
In Orebro, Nahir Besara of Orebro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 86, Nahir Besara for Orebro drives towards goal at Behrn Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Orebro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goteborg's half?
Orebro are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 89, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fabio de Sousa Silva.
Adam Ladeback awards the home team a throw-in.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Orebro Goteborg's Alhassan Yusuf is caught offside.
Free kick in a good position for Orebro!
Adam Ladeback awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Orebro.
Throw-in for Goteborg at Behrn Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
Goteborg needs to be cautious. Orebro have an attacking throw-in.
Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Fabio de Sousa Silva, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Niclas Bergmark is the substitute for Orebro.
Kristopher Da Graca (Goteborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
